###Null Distributions
1) Sample from normal distribution

```{r}
Stat<-rnorm(100,0,1)
```
2) Get the mean differences
```{r}
null <- replicate(10000,mean(rnorm(10,0,1)-mean(rnorm(10,0,1))))                
```
